plot outline: Two identical twin brothers Ricky and Rahul cheat people with their identical faces and make money in the city, an unknown motivational call makes them to travel to unknown place and that place consist of historical backdrop of Pandavaru with some hidden truth. During their travel they meet a strange person named Manmatha [Kishore], which leads to more curiosity and eventually realize the journey of life.
title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free
plot: Two twins con people and make a living in the city, an unknown call takes to them historical place and encounter with Manmatha changes their life forever.
